dcterms:description: A simulated dataset containing particles connected by springs, where each sample consists of 5 interacting particles in a 2D box. The trajectories are simulated by solving motion PDE for the spring system.
dcterms:title: Particles connected by springs

dcterms:creator: Thomas Kipf
Ethan Fetaya
Kuan-Chieh Wang
Max Welling
Richard Zemel
dcterms:description: A simulated dataset containing charged particles, where each sample consists of 5 interacting particles in a 2D box. The trajectories are simulated by solving motion PDE for the charged system.
dcterms:title: Charged particles

dcterms:creator: CMU
dcterms:description: Motion capture data from the Carnegie-Mellon University database, specifically the walking sequences of subject 35, tracking 31 joints.
dcterms:title: Motion capture data
